subject: Changes in the Model Concession Agreement of BOT (Toll) Project permitting the change of ownership from existing 2 years to 1 year after Commercial Operation Date (COD)
text: HRal 7 TTHRf 9iferasrut (7sq5 4de7 & rTHFf HRT4,  4RG TraFR) National Highways Authority of India T44 TA (Ministry of Road Transport and Highways, Government of India) 61-5 & 6, Fac7-10, anq; Tf fcrft 110 075 G-5 & 6, Sector-10, Dwarka, New Delhi-110075 TM4 /Phone 91-11-25074100 25074200 NHAI/Policy Guidelines/ Standard Document/2023 Policy Circular No.11.47/ 2023 dated 19th April; 2023 {Decision taken on E-Office File No. NHAI/CMD/BOT-TOLL/2O2O (Comp: No. 51944)} Sub:: Changes in the Model Concession Agreement of BOT (Toll) project permitting the change of ownership from existing 2 years to year after Commercial Operation Date (COD)- reg: MoRTH vide OM No.NH-24028/14/2014-H (Vol-II) (E-134863) dated 23.05.2022 issued amendments in the Model Concession Agreement of BOT (Toll) projects permitting the change of ownership from existing 2 years to year after Commercial Operation Date (COD) and subsequently, NHAI vide its Policy Circular dated 03.06.2022 (Annexure I) circulated the above amendments to all concerned at NHAI. 2 _ Now, MoRTH vide its circular dated 21.03.2023 (Annexure Il) has clarified that bidders/ consortium members of subsisting BOT(Toll) contracts may also be allowed for the change of ownership after a period of 1 year and the relevant clause of the amended MCA as applicable presently will be applicable for those projects as well. 3. This issues with the approval of Competent Authority. Encl:: As stated above r9/oy/22 (Sanjay Kumar Patel) General Manager (Coord.)
